Reviews.Content: hi booked hotel based pictures various website including own website totally disappointed bed squeaking bathroom wardrobe advertised bb sense paid gbp 75 getting bb cheaper price bf dint options customer service location staff front desk friendly helpful budget traveller

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 times 2830 june 2002 december 2011 budget hotel close victoria station 3 minutes walk close atraction london breakfast poor fist time hadnt wc time toilet basic clean price payed hotel capital europe payed 4 5 stars hotel country romania dover hotel hotel 1 2 stars london hotel price money

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights bathroom compact clean freshen bathroom smell bad basic hotel fire security system puzzling receptionist guy knocking door evening smoking alright apparently signal alert reception smoke wont hear alarm own concern knocking doors questions location handy tubes trains 2 mins wont stay

Reviews.Title: “Unattentive, unhelpful staff”

Reviews.Content: chose hotel based location ie close exam venue checking kindly help suitcase floor receptionist refused help stating 5 star hotel dont porters taking suitcases upstairs injured arm lot pain couldnt sleep 3 hour written exam morning exam returned hotel collect bags management happened writing review online receptionist stated management requested speak dialled spoke foreign language phone letting speak person boss busy call staff management didnt care didnt damn injury disappointing wasnt standard dirty dust lot breakfast continental pot yoghurt toast juice cereal plenty expect guests happy overall experience disappointing

Reviews.Title: “Good location, clean, basic at a good price”

Reviews.Content: partner stayed nights clean biggest world stayed visiting london hotel 5 mins walk victoria rail tube coach station basic price stay

Reviews.Content: book 2 hotel 4 people london bit worry expected wed sardines tin arrival pleasantly surprised basement floor windows door plenty light shaped 3 single beds double plenty space 4 ladies ready nearly spotless neat tidy breakfast basic cereal plenty warm toast tea coffee delicious hot chocolate hotel 6 8 minute walk victoria train bus stations easy travel london staff pleasant helpful nice quiet recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Rooms very small but staff more than helpfull and friendly”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights teenage daughter bedroom clean tidy shower extremely compact fairly tall struggling staff friendly helpful breakfast clean bright breakfast basic served friendly staff complaint bedroom staff toilet bit noisy overnight hotel 5 mins walk victoria bus coach station extremely handy victorian theatre wicked stay stay cheap cheerful

Reviews.Title: “good location, good character, good value”
Reviews.Author: TravelLite001
Reviews.Content: dover hotel convenient location quiet street short walk 5 minutes hustle bustle victoria station staff efficient friendly value money little character stay fancy walk 16 top floor workable bedrooms bathrooms wireless internet tv range english channels continental breakfast simple tasty issue night hot didnt fan learned morning fans available called downstairs didnt aware local restaurants close 1100pm

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, nice staff, nicely situated, but small and unhygienic”
Reviews.Author: Reviewerjoe
Reviews.Content: stay short dont mind hygiene dover hotel ok heavy akward placed doors slam shut beds wheels stuffed hard de cover cloths beneath sheets unbelievable dirty stained unpleasant discover leave smells stuffy window view blind wall bathroom isnt ventilated except flatscreen tv bit example soap looks tea coffee stands plastic shelf thats youre carefull annoying constant buzz machinery hotel tiny breakfast half toast jam nevertheless staff nice 24hrs day available cant lock door outside key cant lockers desk free furthermore location victoria station ten minutes quiet

Reviews.Content: showerbathroom little bit larger didnt bother sleep shower served purpose conveniently located near victoria station mile westminster breakfast cereal coffee machine juice freshly toast brought table held lunch stay save money double bed tired didnt mind noise loud slamming doors creeking floor happened times nights

Reviews.Title: “Thanks to the nightmanager for setting off the fire alarm @ 2am with garlic bread”

Reviews.Content: location excellent 5 min walk victoria station 2 hotel pay adequate bathroom tiny shower bath reasonably clean vacuum bed worst stay double bed sheeted single bed sheet half night sleeping mattress hotel linked hotel door basement wasnt issue 2am night manager set fire alarm burnt garlic bread kitchen linked hotels 2 doors filled smoke lingered hall couple hours manager sprayed air freshener gas country alot sleep night night kept awake noisy plumbing breakfast basic expect money selection 4 cereals slice toast coffee machine
